summary: Route & Mount Audit (P0) - All 7 NEW module routes are accessible and load correctly. Routes: /dashboard/logistics, /dashboard/hr, /dashboard/marketing, /dashboard/b2b, /dashboard/compliance, /dashboard/ai, /dashboard/subscriptions. Each module page has proper data-testid attributes, loading states, error handling, and back button navigation. Sidebar links are correctly defined but only appear when corresponding capabilities are activated for the tenant (expected behavior).
critical_code_review_comments: All 7 new module pages follow consistent pattern: client component, useSearchParams for tenant slug, loading/error states with data-testid attributes, back button to dashboard
Dashboard layout correctly wraps all pages with AuthProvider for authentication
Sidebar navigation in dashboard/page.tsx correctly includes new module links (lines 144-153) with capability-based filtering
New module links only appear in sidebar when corresponding capability is ACTIVE for tenant - this is expected behavior per capability-based access control
Each new module page has unique data-testid: logistics-dashboard, hr-dashboard, marketing-dashboard, b2b-dashboard, compliance-dashboard, ai-dashboard, subscriptions-dashboard
All module pages use MOCKED API calls (setTimeout simulation) as noted in review request - this is expected for route audit
context_for_next_testing_agent: Route & Mount Audit complete. All 7 new module routes verified working: logistics, hr, marketing, b2b, compliance, ai, subscriptions. Sidebar links are capability-gated (only show when capability is active). Module pages use MOCKED API calls. Existing routes (accounting, inventory, analytics, crm, payments) also verified working.

new_module_routes./dashboard/logistics?tenant=acme: PASS - data-testid='logistics-dashboard' found, UI loads correctly with Active Deliveries, Completed Today, Pending Pickup, Delayed Orders cards
new_module_routes./dashboard/hr?tenant=acme: PASS - data-testid='hr-dashboard' found, UI loads correctly with Total Employees, On Leave, Pending Approvals, Open Positions cards
new_module_routes./dashboard/marketing?tenant=acme: PASS - data-testid='marketing-dashboard' found, UI loads correctly
new_module_routes./dashboard/b2b?tenant=acme: PASS - data-testid='b2b-dashboard' found, UI loads correctly
new_module_routes./dashboard/compliance?tenant=acme: PASS - data-testid='compliance-dashboard' found, UI loads correctly
new_module_routes./dashboard/ai?tenant=acme: PASS - data-testid='ai-dashboard' found, UI loads correctly with Active Automations, Tasks Completed, Time Saved, AI Insights cards
new_module_routes./dashboard/subscriptions?tenant=acme: PASS - data-testid='subscriptions-dashboard' found, UI loads correctly

existing_module_routes./dashboard/inventory?tenant=acme: PASS - Page loads with 'Inventory & Warehouse' header
existing_module_routes./dashboard/payments?tenant=acme: PASS - Page loads with 'Payments & Wallets' header

sidebar_navigation.new_module_links_in_code: VERIFIED - Lines 144-153 in dashboard/page.tsx define Logistics, HR & Payroll, Marketing, B2B & Wholesale, Compliance, AI & Automation, Subscriptions links
sidebar_navigation.capability_filtering: VERIFIED - Links filtered by activeCapabilities (line 168-169), only show when capability is ACTIVE
sidebar_navigation.links_visible_in_ui: NOT VISIBLE - Expected behavior since capabilities not activated for test tenant

auth_flow.protected_routes: PASS - Dashboard routes redirect to /login when not authenticated
auth_flow.magic_link_login: PASS - Magic link authentication works correctly
auth_flow.tenant_context: PASS - Tenant context propagated via ?tenant=acme query parameter

mocked_apis.note: Module pages use simulated API calls - this is expected for route audit, not functional completeness
